about_the_game: The Official B.I.O.T.A. Soundtrack (or S.O.U.N.D.T.R.A.C.K.) is made up of 15 chiptune tracks with sounds chunks so blocky you can almost see them with your eyes. Encompassing the player with a warm blanket of sounds, get ready for over 25 minutes of music, that, when tastefully looped, can make for hundreds of hours of listening time. Use it for an ear-filler during a gym workout, home working, working from home, or - in extreme cases - not working at all.
detailed_description: The Official B.I.O.T.A. Soundtrack (or S.O.U.N.D.T.R.A.C.K.) is made up of 15 chiptune tracks with sounds chunks so blocky you can almost see them with your eyes. Encompassing the player with a warm blanket of sounds, get ready for over 25 minutes of music, that, when tastefully looped, can make for hundreds of hours of listening time. Use it for an ear-filler during a gym workout, home working, working from home, or - in extreme cases - not working at all.

name: B.I.O.T.A. Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 62 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 162 MB available space

short_description: Listen to 15 chiptune tracks making up for at least half of the audio experience that is B.I.O.T.A. Enjoy the carefully constructed aural voyage to accompany multicoloured pixels shaped like aliens that you need to blast with an assortment of a multitude of weapons, a sub, spaceship and a mech.
